meta.title: HacktoberFest2023｜ILLA Cloud
meta.description: Celebrate HacktoberFest with ILLA Cloud. By contributing to ILLA Cloud, you'll make an impact on the open-source community and gain experience and swags.

hacktober-introduction.title: Celebrate Hacktoberfest with ILLA Cloud
hacktober-introduction.description: Hacktoberfest is a celebration of open-source projects, their brilliant maintainers, and the community of contributors. For an entire month, we come together to give back to the community and celebrate the power of open source. And we want YOU to be a part of it!

description.1: Hacktoberfest is a celebration of open-source projects, their brilliant maintainers, and the community of contributors. For an entire month, we come together to give back to the community and celebrate the power of open source. And we want YOU to be a part of it!
description.2: This year, we're inviting you to join us in the festivities and contribute to ILLA Cloud. By lending your expertise, you'll not only be making a positive impact on the open-source community but also gaining experience and swags. Let's make a difference together!

illa.title: About ILLA Cloud
illa.description: ILLA Cloud is a low-code platform. Anyone can build internal tools with ILLA Cloud in minutes.

all.1: We support many different ways of contributing, and every accepted contribution is eligible to receive ILLA Swag! Each contribution method has a different point allocation, and you can participate multiple times to earn points.
all.2: For each user, we will offer two months of membership with the promotion code:

build-with-illa.1: Build an app using ILLA and contribute it to the ILLA Marketplace to gain points.
build-with-illa.2: Use the resources of ILLA's partners when building apps to gain more points.
build-with-illa.3: We have organized some ideas, and you can review the ones that interest you. You can contact us to assign an idea to you, and you can complete it.

description.illa-ai: Build an AI Agent using ILLA and contribute it to the ILLA Marketplace to gain points.
description.pr: Submit pull request to fix the open issues and be merged by ILLA to gain Fridge Magnets and Stickers. We have a curated list of Hacktoberfest issues that are ready for you to pick up. You can submit both front-end and back-end pull requests.

awesome.1: Submit an issue with your Apps or Agents
awesome.2: Submit feature suggestions or bug reports

swag.title: Win our swag
swag.description: We offer two types of prizes, and you can win one just by participating in the competition. The other one major prizes will be awarded based on the final score rankings. We will contact you after the event is over.

illa-swag.title: ILLA SWAG
illa-swag.desc: Earn points by contributing to ILLA through any of the aforementioned ways and stand a chance to win exciting rewards based on your points ranking.

ace.title: Ace
ace.desc: Point is in the top 10 percent or PR is merged

master.title: Master
master.desc: Point is in the top 50 to top 10 percent

oss-swag.title: OSS SWAG
oss-swag.desc: Explore and participate in our partner's activities, and stand a chance to win incredible prizes generously provided by our esteemed partners.

list.label: HuggingFace
list.description: The largest open-source community for machine learning, gathering models and datasets contributed by machine learning experts from around the world.
